TABLE.NAME: ucla_help
TABLE.COMMENT: Table to hold user defined context to support contact for the UCLA Help Block

FIELD.NAME: context_name
FIELD.COMMENT: Can be class or category name. If matches a name in the config.php file, then config.php file takes precedence.

FIELD.NAME: contact
FIELD.COMMENT: Can be JIRA user or email. Will be treated as either depending on block setting.
